mapper.select: SELECT LPAD(COALESCE(MAX(TO_NUMBER(REGEXP_REPLACE(member_num, '[^0-9]', ''))), 0) + 1, 6, '0') AS member_auto_num FROM member WHERE REGEXP_LIKE(member_num, '^[0-9]+$')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (MEMBER_NUM, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PW, MEMBER_NAME, GENDER, BIRTH, NICKNAME, TITLE_NUM) VALUES (#{memberNum}, #{memberId}, #{memberPw}, #{memberName}, #{gender}, #{memberBirth}, #{nickName}, NULL)
